description: This file is a PHP source code that manages the Wi-Fi configuration page for a router or gateway device. It includes code to initialize Wi-Fi parameters, retrieve and handle Wi-Fi radio and security settings, and generate the web interface for adjusting Wi-Fi network settings for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands. The file also contains embedded JavaScript for client-side interaction and configuration saving.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to save the wireless network configuration data to the server and reloads the configuration page.

methods.name: show_extch
methods.description: Displays the extension channel options based on the selected channel number.

methods.name: check_add
methods.description: Validates user input for adding a new MAC address to the control list.

methods.name: adjust_row
methods.description: Reindexes and styles the rows in the control list tables after add or delete operations.

methods.name: add_row
methods.description: Adds a new row to either the access control list or auto-learned devices table, ensuring no duplicate MAC addresses.

methods.name: del_row
methods.description: Deletes a specified row from the control list after confirmation.

methods.name: add_auto
methods.description: Copies a row from the auto-learned devices table into the control list for manual addition.

methods.name: save_filter
methods.description: Collects current filter rules, constructs a configuration JSON, and submits it via AJAX to save the filter settings.

methods.name: save_config
methods.description: Gathers all Wi-Fi configuration parameters from the form and sends them to the server with AJAX.

methods.name: save_enable
methods.description: Saves the enabled/disabled state of Wi-Fi radios and WPS settings.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates the WPS PIN checksum according to the recognized algorithm.

methods.name: pair_client
methods.description: Initiates WPS pairing process via AJAX with provided method and PIN.

methods.name: pair_cancel
methods.description: Cancels an ongoing WPS pairing process after user confirmation.
